_header: God with His angels I have forloren
Subjects: laments; sinner, lament of; illustrations, verse accompanying
_description: The lament of a damned soul — three couplets

CULKk424.Transcription: God wyth hyts angelis y haue y-lorne

BLHar2316.First Lines: God wiht hise aungeles i haue forlorenAllas ȝe while ȝat i was boren…
BLHar2316.Last Lines: …To ȝe fend i owe fewteErnage homage and gret lewte
